extendedInfo.description: Never forget a password again. Easily store, protect, and sync your PINs, passwords and other sensitive info with your Android phone or tablet.Note: This is a fully functional, 30-day trial of Passwords Plus. You have the option to purchase at any point during your trial for a one-time fee of only $9.99! Just open Passwords Plus on your device and tap 'Buy' at the bottom of your screen to follow the in-app purchase steps. Why Passwords Plus?1. Keep your info âin syncâ across all of your devices thanks to our secure cloud storage and SamePageâ¢ technology. Changes made on your Android device will automatically appear wherever Passwords Plus 2.0 is installed (Windows, Mac and/or iOS). 2. Up-and-running in less than 5 minutes â Easy to setup and unlike other apps, no need to open a 3rd party cloud account or pay an additional subscription fee in order to sync, backup or restore your data.3. Proven industry experience â Founded in 1984, DataViz is an industry leader in developing productivity solutions, including mobile and password protection software for the past 10+ years. Key Features:â¢ Secure â 256-bit AES encryption (military grade) keeps data safe and secure.â¢ Auto-Synchronization â Updates made on one device will automatically be reflected on all devices (option available to turn on/off).â¢ Backup/Restore â Included free! Passwords Plus info can be retrieved if your phone, tablet or computer is lost or stolen (when auto-sync is enabled).â¢ Generate Password â Automatically generate random passwords to avoid using âobviousâ or âduplicateâ passwords.â¢ Auto Lock â Set Passwords Plus to lock after a specified time period to protect your data (phone/tablet only).â¢ Self-destruct â Configure to erase your data if multiple wrong passwords are attempted.â¢ Templates included â Get started quickly with minimal data entry.â¢ Categories & favorites â Customize categories and set favorites to easily find frequently used records.â¢ Responsive sales and support teams in-house!*Note: Passwords Plus is not just for Androidâ¦ Windows and Mac desktop/laptop versions are available for purchase from DataViz and the Mac App Store respectively. More info: http://www.dataviz.com/BuyPWPappsPasswords Plus for the iPad/iPhone is available from the App Store.

reviews.title: Stepped up from Palm!
reviews.comment: I upgraded from PWP 1 to PWP 2 and PWP Android. Once I figured out I needed to purchase two programs (one for Android, one for PC) all welt well in installing PWP and it did a perfect job of accessing my old PWP data - automatically. I have been using it only for a short time, but it seems to take a VERY long time to sync with the \"cloud\" even after the initial sync. Perhaps there is still something I need to adjust to or learn. The initial sync did take a very long time. I have a large amount of data in PWP, but I would not categorize it as extremely large. I don\'t know if the sync process will continue even if I close the app on my Android.
reviews.author: Wayne Mock

reviews.title: Cloud in safe is better
reviews.comment: Horrible customer service.  Because of data viz I lost all my passwords and had to start over.  Don\'t waste your money on app or windows version.  If something breaks customer service can\'t fix it.
reviews.author: James Studer

reviews.title: Useful, but careful!
reviews.comment: I\'ve used Passwords Plus on my Palm PDA for years and have always been happy with it. This new version is a worthy successor and the sync function with Windows is easier than the old Hotsync used to be. However, it is actually possible to make the elementary mistake of losing the master password: I did it:-( If this happens, and you have to start over again with both programs (Windows and Android) it can work, but you have to give another email address in order to receive a new sync number. Customer Support never reacted to my request for help, and I had to discover this for myself. For this reason, I\'ll give the app 4 stars.
reviews.author: Colin Hall

reviews.title: Too bad it doesn\'t work on Nexus 7
reviews.comment: I use this fine on my Asus Transformer Infinity  tablet just fine.  BUT when I load the program on my other Google Nexus 7 tablet, there is no search capability, or even sorting by categories -- both of these features work on my Transformer tablet, so I\'m not sure why they don\'t work on the Nexus 7.  I\'ve also had 1 hiccup on cloud synchronization where a poor connection during sync resulted in a deleted record...otherwise synchronization has worked well with my Windows PC.  (It would\'ve been nice to have an undo feature that reverted back to before sync.)  So overall this is a promising program, but it needs a few tweaks.
reviews.author: Carlos Branco

reviews.title: Too bad it does not work well on tablets
reviews.comment: I have the same problem the Nexus 7 users have complained about. Search and categories are missing on my ASUS Transformer Infinity. I am a long time user of PWP V1 on Windows. Rock solid. Version 2 works well on my phone and PC. Without search or categories it is very difficult to use if you have as many entries as I have.   When you fix this I will give you the other 2 stars.
reviews.author: Randy Martin

reviews.title: Stay Away
reviews.comment: Absolutely abysmal customer service. I have purchased Dataviz\'s Documents To Go as well as Windows & Android versions of Password Plus. Never a problem with Docs to go. Password on Windows works great if & when it works. A few months ago the Windows version crashed & it took Dataviz support more than a week to get me back up. However, their solution meant that I lost all my data & had to re-enter. Windows crashed again a few days ago. I emailed tech support over 4 days ago & haven\'t heard back.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Support
reviews.comment: I have pwp on 3 devices (laptop with windows 7, galaxy note, surface pro). App works great on phone and computer but cannot setup sync on surface. Paid $20 for app on laptop, $10 more for phone and an other $20 for surface and pwp support will not get back to me. I would give 5 stars for phone and laptop and 0 for surface (lack of support) so for now I will give a blended score of 2
reviews.author: Phil Malenfant

reviews.title: Well worth it!
reviews.comment: I like the setup of this one better than the previous app I tried.  I had to do a factory reset on my phone yesterday.  I was so glad I was able to restore my information.
reviews.author: Vicki Ryals

reviews.title: Nexus 7 issues here also
reviews.comment: Search and category features missing for me as well. This makes for a HUGE loss of functionality... Otherwise would be 4 or 5 star.
reviews.author: Ray Phoenix

reviews.title: Denesha Shaver
reviews.comment: I hope that is work very well zooming  .and I will be happy! !!!!
reviews.author: denesha shaver

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Where has this been all my life?? This is absolutely the best product around. I have been keeping spreadsheets on multiple devices for years, and of course one gets updated and the other one does not.  I have already purchased this for my PC, Android and next will be my iPad.  This is a MUST HAVE app.
reviews.author: Nicole Yim

reviews.title: This is a Good App!
reviews.comment: I have used Passwords Plus for years on Palm Treo and Palm TX with great success. I just have to migrate my old password info to the Nexus phone. I am very pleased!.
reviews.author: Chuck Woodard

reviews.title: Impressive App
reviews.comment: This app really meets my need to store sensitive information securely while still being able to effortlessly sync that information across platforms.  If you could also show the number of records stored on Android devices, that would make the app perfect for my needs!
reviews.author: J. D. Ross, Jr.

reviews.title: Needs some work!
reviews.comment: This would be a nice app if I could only buy it! I\'ve installed the demo version but the BUY button does not work. I\'ve tried un-installing it and re-installing it. I bought the upgrade from version 1.0 for Windows, which I\'ve used for years, but have gained nothing as I still can\'t buy the full version for the Android. I\'d really like a Linux version. Have reported issues to Dataviz but no response so far!
reviews.author: Mike Valiant
